name: Criminal Mystery - The Mind Game
description:
crime case game is hidden crime case in different crime city.
crime case is a puzzle solving game and challenging game.
in mystery hidden object game find clue and get evidence to catch criminal.
crime case investigation of the real criminal.
are you ready to solve your first murder cases?
list of features:
- find the evidence from all hidden objects and guess the criminal
- police punished criminal when arrived police case.
- solve hidden crimes
- share with you friends.
